reviewText: My students love it! Around 1:00 each day my students need some activity and this is great! I love doing the walking as well.

Good for mother and child or father and child-fun for both and challenging.
Good guidance and visuals. I gave to my 3 year old grandson and his parents
and they reported the enjoyment..

This type is good for children of all ages especially for children under the age of 12. They will want to play the tape all the time. I love it because it's not too long and the kids will not get bored, nice work.
Every morning when my class comes in we start our work out and the children in enjoy working out with this DVD. I recommend this video to teachers or those who work at a day care centers.
